software_query.query_string: SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?itemLabel ?abbreviation WHERE {{?item wdt:P31 wd:Q7397 .} UNION {?d1_sub wdt:P279 wd:Q7397 .?item wdt:P31 ?d1_sub .} UNION {?d1_sub wdt:P279 wd:Q7397 .?d2_sub wdt:P279 ?d1_sub .?item wdt:P31 ?d2_sub .} UNION {?d1_sub wdt:P279 wd:Q7397 .?d2_sub wdt:P279 ?d1_sub .?d3_sub wdt:P279 ?d2_sub .?item wdt:P31 ?d3_sub .} UNION {?d1_sub wdt:P279 wd:Q7397 .?d2_sub wdt:P279 ?d1_sub .?d3_sub wdt:P279 ?d2_sub .?d4_sub wdt:P279 ?d3_sub .?item wdt:P31 ?d4_sub .} UNION {?d1_sub wdt:P279 wd:Q7397 .?d2_sub wdt:P279 ?d1_sub .?d3_sub wdt:P279 ?d2_sub .?d4_sub wdt:P279 ?d3_sub .?d5_sub wdt:P279 ?d4_sub .?item wdt:P31 ?d5_sub . }OPTIONAL {?item skos:altLabel ?abbreviation . FILTER(lang(?abbreviation)='en')  }SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en'. }}LIMIT 100000
